mapper.select: SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.PROGRM_FILE_NM , TB.PROGRM_STRE_PATH , TB.PROGRM_KOREAN_NM , TB.PROGRM_DC , TB.URL FROM ( SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM , PROGRM_STRE_PATH , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM , PROGRM_DC , URL FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_KOREAN_NM like '%'|| #searchKeyword#||'%' ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "totcnt" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_KOREAN_NM like '%'|| #searchKeyword#||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "totcnt" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = #searchKeyword#

SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" FROM COMTNPROGRMLIST WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = #searchKeyword#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNPROGRMLIST ( PROGRM_FILE_NM , PROGRM_STRE_PATH , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM , PROGRM_DC , URL ) VALUES ( #progrmFileNm# , #progrmStrePath# , #progrmKoreanNm# , #progrmDc# , #URL# )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNPROGRMLIST SET PROGRM_STRE_PATH =#progrmStrePath# , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM=#progrmKoreanNm# , PROGRM_DC =#progrmDc# , URL =#URL# WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM=#progrmFileNm#
